website_summaries.verdict: The Motorola Moto X is an excellent Android smartphone, but senseless carrier neglect will make this a tougher-than-necessary sell on T-Mobile.
cons: Not available in stores or with any deferred payment plans from T-Mobile

customer_reviews.title: Way Ahead of its Time!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was way ahead of it's time. It had an OLED screen, a Voice Assistant, hand gestures to open the camera without ever going to the program first, or even opening the phone. Ease in your hand and good size without being too big. I have had mine now for 6 years and have never needed to change the battery. Stays charged all day and more. Would buy again, in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: S. President

customer_reviews.title: Got AT&T branded phone, with their apps pre-installed and was prompted to sign in to MyATT etc.,.  Sending back.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Very responsive. OK Google now is a gimmick, does not work all the time. It is never equal to typing your search words. But, this phone is listed as 'Unlocked'. But, mine came branded with AT&T logo and had AT&T apps installed. I have requested a return. Let me see what happens. I bought from company named 'MyParana'. I did not want to spend money to sign up with T-Mobile to find out this phone will work or not (None of the people I know have nano-SIM from non-AT&T carrier). So, chose the safe method to return it immediately. I do not like how they advertise as 'not-carrier associated' and send you branded stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Received a better product than advertised
customer_reviews.text: The info provided listed the XT1058 16GB model, which represent the AT&T variant of the phone. Though carrier unlocked, this model is notoriously locked down and comes pre-loaded with AT&T bloatware. What I received instead was a 32GB XT1053, which is the "Developer" model with unlocked bootloader. While this won't make a difference to most people, it allowed me to easily install a much newer ROM than Android 4.4 version it arrived with. The only warning is that mine arrived with the language preset to Spanish. I run a factory reset right away to provide an easy way to switch it to English, but this could present a problem to someone who is unfamiliar with Android devices.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Size and Durability
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for around 2-3 years before replacing it. It held up surprisingly well, despite a few nasty falls the screen never cracked and the exterior had only minor dings and scratches. After switching devises I started really missing the curved back, it fits really well in the hand, especially when compared to most modern phones with their perfectly flat square backs. The screen was surprisingly nice, and although the camera isn't the best on the market it is certainly quite good. At 4.7 inches it fits perfectly into pockets, while keeping a well-balanced feel.
customer_reviews.author: Shiba

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone Alternative Hands Down!
customer_reviews.text: Really grew to love this phone over time. My only regret was not getting the 32 or even 64gb model. It's fine though because I can use my USB OTG cable and 64gb flash drive for added music and videos. You learn to appreciate the added features that Motorola has included especially the Moto Assist. I am looking forward to the release of the Moto X+1 and will keep my 16gb X as a backup. Near vanilla version of Android Kit Kat makes this an ideal phone. I used to have gripes about the camera, but it still takes great outdoor shots and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Superbolt

customer_reviews.title: if you go google you cant go apple
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone! Best interactive features yet, way better then Siri. Voice commands for sending text and making calls and even setting up reminders or appointments! The only down fall is the tiny tiny mic... if your have the drive feature on the phone activated it has a hard time understanding you. So if you get a call it's hard to answer hands free. It will ask you if you want to answer or reply with a text but then does nothing unless the car is dead quite
customer_reviews.author: J. Aultman

customer_reviews.title: Works For What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Yes it cheap. No, its not my usually super-techy gadget. It is, however, a fine replacement for the cell phone that was stolen and which I can't exactly afford to replace right now. I still owe $400 on that phone *sigh* but now at least I can get calls. I can also definitely verify that my phone was unlocked. The ROM says "Verizon" but I have it on AT&T.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Goddess

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I am Very Pleased with the phone. It has fulfilled all my expectations so far after one month of use. The only reason I am giving this product a 4-star rating is that the charger unit is working erratically! On two different occasions the unit was not charged at all. This makes me nervous, especially now that I will be travelling and need a reliable battery life. Also removing the screen protector resolved the problem of scratchy and garbled microphone sound.
customer_reviews.author: Stellar

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was using Nexus 5 for a year and thought of buying a compact phone. This feels very good in hands and don't see any issue with speed / display quality compared to Nexus 5. I know camera is not good in this phone as well as loud speaker which I don't use regularly. Will have to wait few months for 5.0 update... anyways I don't like lollipop!
customer_reviews.author: Suresh

customer_reviews.title: Great phone - better if it had SD
customer_reviews.text: Solid phone, especially great if you don't like the trend for the large phones. This one is a bit smaller. The only downside is that it doesn't have an SD slot. But it's a great deal for the cost. Performance is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy. The rest of the phone was clean and ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because the phone was advertised as new but had visible wear on the power button and the accessories were obviously repackaged. Even for a refurbished/used phone, I am very happy. The rest of the phone was clean and scratch free. It came unlocked as advertised and works well in South Asia cell phone service. The phone features are amazing and the speed is great. The touch-less response is a little slow to start with the phone in an otter-box case. The stock AT&T contact list is a little annoying but the rest of the AT&T software can be disabled. Still very much a flagship phone and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Christensen IV

customer_reviews.title: The stock stuff in there was depleting the battery fast ...
customer_reviews.text: The stock stuff in there was depleting the battery fast; a factory reset took care of that. The inner back of the phone is supposed to be glued together; it isn't. The right side edge of the screen should feel smooth as you move your finger against the plastic, outer frame; it doesn't. I don't know if the vendor or Motorola is to blame, but I bought a "new" phone and it should not have those issues. It is OK for it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great phone; still not perfect
customer_reviews.text: First of all, always on listening is a godsend for the car, and for folks like me who constantly lose their phone. The processor is crazy fast, the cameras are both great, and I love that there is almost no bloatware. Even with GPS and Wi-Fi always on, I have yet to run down the battery. What bloatware is on the phone is from Google, whose kool-aid I have thoroughly drunk. However, I'm frustrated that storage isn't expandable, and the price point seems a bit too high.
customer_reviews.author: johnnyringo3333

customer_reviews.title: trully good phone
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good android phone. Has everything the Samsung S5 / LG G3 have 6 at least the everyday apps. Camera is very good. And all for half the price of the bigger more expensive phones. I thought I'd prefer a bigger screen but I really got used to the 4.7". And obviously more comfortable in my pocket. I have the phone for over a month with no problems at all. I trully recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: yoav bentov

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but...
customer_reviews.text: The materials aren't as durable nor as nice as the latest Moto G, the screen is a tad small and I hate AMOLED displays... I don't need the special features added on top of the near stock Android personally... But overall the phone is actually really good! It's a great Android device!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: does not work, garbage
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this phone. The seller said in his announce this was a new phone, well it isn't. The battery hardly lasts 10 hours. The audio does not work properly. And now I cannot use the phone unless I have WiFi. 4g does not work since I have to update its software. Warranty is no good in any country but US and I bought it two months ago. I want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Carolina I.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Fast, works well, good design. Battery life gets me through at least a day of typical use with bright screen, and often 2 days. I had to cut down my existing micro-SIM card to fit inside but I managed to do that with a pen, a pair of scissors and a small piece of sandpaper.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Responds really fast, battery lasts almost two days, voice controls are great, I dropped it on the floor a few times (including concrete, hardwood, etc...) and not a single scratch (while my Samsung phone broke after a 3 feet fall on carpet). I can make calls in places where my Samsung phone had no connection at all
customer_reviews.author: ZapoTeX

customer_reviews.title: We had Spr*nt service before and went to AT&T for the better calling plan and coverage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she loves the phone. We had Spr*nt service before and went to AT&T for the better calling plan and coverage. Very nice phone and didn't have to lock ourselves into a contract because we brought our own phone.
customer_reviews.author: Woland

customer_reviews.title: Moto X? More like Xtremely great! (2015 Review)
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this phone. Now that its a couple years old, I got it for around $200. At this price, its a steal, and it still holds up to modern phone very well. I upgraded from a Moto G due to it dragging while multitasking. Really, I don't have any cons for this phone. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase from seller again.
customer_reviews.text: I received the Motorola Moto X 16 gb phone on time and was pleased with the condition and packaging. I had a couple of problems that were not due to any misleadings from the seller. But they were prompt in helping me solve the issues so I could set my phone up. Im very happy with my purchase. After using an IPhone for years, it's taking me a little time to get used to the droid. But I love the features of the Moto that iphones do not offer, especially the abundance of free apps. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: melanie d.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This my second Android phone after Nexus 4 and I'm loving it! The weight and materials is excellent and the system is good with Motorola adds-on. I think is better than Nexus phone, actually I was planning to purchase N5, but after I reading some reviews about this X I decide to take one, and is worth every $! FYI this model is no.XT1053 and have a Kitkat right now via OTA, like T-Mobile version.
customer_reviews.author: Talal

customer_reviews.title: Wrong model number.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my wife to replace her AT&T Moto X that she dropped and cracked the screen. Although the box said it was the AT&T XT1058 model it was actually the XT1060 which is for Verizon. Luckily it was sim unlocked so she could still use it but I needed to manually change many of the settings to get the data to work. If it wasn't for the fact that I'm a phone nerd she wouldn't be able to use it and it would have to go back.
customer_reviews.author: William Sincavage

customer_reviews.title: The First Best Phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever made. I'd never had such an awesome experience with a smartphone until the Moto X. Runs smoothly. Clean OS. Runs games well. Amazing color quality. Very durable. I wish I had bought this phone when it first came out. Only drawback is the lack of an SD slot. After having the phone a while, you miss it on the 16GB version.
customer_reviews.author: David Godbey

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone - but referb
customer_reviews.text: Clearly a Referb from this buyer. Came with small scratches, and aftermarket plug. Slow shipping from Singapore. I have had the phone about a month now, the battery will not last through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Tenney

customer_reviews.title: Moto X met both my hardware and software expectations
customer_reviews.text: This mobile phone seems to address many of mine and probably most of other users expectations regarding functionality and user friendliness. It seems to me that Motorola/Google did a deep research on previous Android functionality issues and solved most of them, The processor is fast, the operating system reliable and its innovations are easy to grasp and become familiar with. The only remaining issue in my opiinion is its 16 GB RAM limit. Despite of that, I recommend this cel phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Dannemann

customer_reviews.title: Clon phone I knew it at the moment I unboxed ...
customer_reviews.text: Clon phone I knew it at the moment I unboxed it, I know now why it has no warranty the phone is not working anymore, all started with the microphone not working and then the screen and so on as. I have a friend who owns one but I guess he is a little smater he got his from Motomaker.com a little more expensive but authentic and with guaranty.
customer_reviews.author: MARCO A. SALINAS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone with good battery life and plenty of power for my requirements. I dont know how to get rid of AT&T phone book though. I am using the phone on TMobile.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thakar

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Easy platform. Works just like my Android tablet. Durable with long battery life. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pink Cabin

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, I would say that this is the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, I would say that this is the best phone I have ever owned, I've owned S3, S4, Iphone3g-5s. And no questions asked this is the best, the only con I found on this phone is the camera. I accidentally dropped it on water and nothing happened to the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: battery wasn't good from the get go but hen it got worse ...
customer_reviews.text: Dang it, battery wasn't good from the get go but hen it got worse after the lollipop software whatever. If I wanted bad battery life at that time I would have gotten an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: great phone love everything about it. super fast perfect size for me. well worth price. battery life is just great last forever
customer_reviews.author: kmac80s

customer_reviews.title: Good for first timers
customer_reviews.text: Slow phone, normal camera and the battery doesn't last as much as I thought. Good for first timers, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great phone to use and came in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works, but took a while to associate with Carrier
customer_reviews.text: The features work as advertised (OK Google Now). My only issue is that it took a few hours to associate with my carrier (LIME). In fact, it took so long that the rep who inserted the nano-SIM told me that the phone was locked.
customer_reviews.author: DamienA

customer_reviews.title: Its a MINI BEAST!
customer_reviews.text: Phone is awesome! you should buy it if you want power and compact size, almost run all that i throw it!
customer_reviews.author: Imakandy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fast, and it's more compact than most Androids these days...
customer_reviews.author: Westovers

customer_reviews.title: Verify its unlocked if you buy mine had AT&T logo on it
customer_reviews.text: Unsure says it unlocked but has AT&T logo on phone I have not tried on another service yet. Other than that it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: It's a awesome phone, but after one month it started to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a awesome phone, but after one month it started to get slow and hot also.... it's being a little unconfortable because it's really hot... sometimes i think that it will burn in fire at any moment... It works pretty well in south america.. i'm living in Brazil and it works pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Juliano

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I really hated this phone. I am much happier with Samsung Galaxy 5
customer_reviews.author: ZUZU Nutter

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully and without problem
customer_reviews.text: Came new and sealed in the box. Works wonderfully and without problem. What a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Big Drunk Jedi

customer_reviews.title: best smart phone I have used!
customer_reviews.text: I am living in China while moto X is not sold in my country, so I had to buy it from Amazon. It was about 2 weeks late when I received my phone. It is worthy to wait for that long time because of moto X's perfect using experience. Now I have use my moto X for almost a month and I like it. Thank you Moto & Amazon so much.
customer_reviews.author: Tau

customer_reviews.title: It came with a scratch
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a scratch in the left edge beside the chip place.
customer_reviews.author: Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not feel well, the charger does not arrive, and the team is more deteriorated than described.
customer_reviews.author: joan manuel paulino

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite part of the phone is the camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my wife almost two months ago and she absolutly loves it! Her favorite part of the phone is the camera. We have two little ones under two so trying to get every moment captured often ends up as a blurry mess usually. But not with the Moto X!!
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Hoiseth

customer_reviews.title: Although unlocked and works great. The phone has at & t logo atb ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to be brand new (and it might be) but the box didn't seem to have original side items. The manual logged photocopied. Although unlocked and works great. The phone has at & t logo atb the back which I wasn't expecting.
customer_reviews.author: sushanta

customer_reviews.title: Just as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great just as advertised.... Just wish it had more internal storage or at least a microsd slot
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: I have used this phone for about a month. So far so good. It fits great in my hands easy to use. I switched from an iPhone to the Moto X it was not a big adjustment. It has good speed and the apps I was use to on the iPhone. I don't feel like I downgraded.
customer_reviews.author: monica lane

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed this product it was a little slow after the ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this product it was a little slow after the first week or two and only declined from there. But, the moto x voice features this phone is capable of changed my veiws on what a phone should be able to do.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Phone amazing, but I got an AT&T unlocked version with logo and apps from AT&T, no international unlocked version
customer_reviews.text: The phone is amazing. But I got an AT&T unlocked version, I thought that it was an International unlocked version. So it comes with the AT&T logo at the back, also comes with some nasty AT&T apps which are useless for me. So the phone is pretty cool but the seller is not totally honest with the cellphone description. The phone is 5 starts for me, the seller not that much. I'm not sure if the seller is reselling carrier cellphones on a legal way or this is a kind of illegal business, but I have a bad feeling about it. So be aware about that.
customer_reviews.author: lruiz

customer_reviews.title: Nice smartphone. Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Nice smartphone. Stylish, user-friendly and cheap. Tiny disadvantage - it come with WHITE charger, while the phone itself is solid black. Definitely, for completely black phones only black (or dark) accessories should be used. :) But this is only my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Grishin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It had a litle audio problem, but the official service fixed.

customer_reviews.title: awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone is in perfect condition. I had to buy a sim card slot because I broke mine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone for me
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, feel in the hand, awesome interface and the cool features, shaking it to quickly open the camera, the no-hands google now.

customer_reviews.title: good phone for beginners
customer_reviews.text: good phone for beginners. smaller than I thought it would be. Still have to figure out voicemail. Have to constantly push on button. I would not purchase this phone. It was represented as a second generation which it was not. Not a good phone for pre-paid.

customer_reviews.title: top
customer_reviews.text: great price with the discount, white is a nice finish, works perfectly and no bloatware

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful phone - best I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, best phone I've ever owned. I bought it used and must say that the seller sent the phone quickly and it was in very good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tina C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is just better than iPhone for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Check that it works with your provider though

customer_reviews.title: Truly a "smart" phone.
customer_reviews.text: Most useful features available on a smartphone as of today. I never thought that I was able to have a big screen on a small phone. Sounds contradictory, but you will see what I mean once you hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Clint B

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this phone. I love Motorola phones but this has been a total disaster of a phone.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Phone complete died on me within 2 days of having it. Returned for a refund

customer_reviews.title: Its an excellent product and i like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Its an excellent product and i like it a lot. Maybe you cand work on include the headset because i was wating for that when i received the product but now, when i checked the box; it says that doesn't includes that accesorie. Its just and advice to improve the offer. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I can't praise enough this cellphone, it is lightweight, fast, really smart. The only issue is that I have an accent so it doesn't quite get what I'm saying so I have to talk slowly, other than that I love love love my phone!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Torres

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is exactly what is advertised. I am enjoying this nice gift. I like the hand size of my phone. I choose this phone over all iPhones. Thank you Motorola.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not new. Open box that was poorly re-taped. Not even the right (unlocked) model. Returned.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it was a great phone.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the phone because it was locked on AT&T network and I was not able to change it to Consumer Cellular. Otherwise it was a great phone.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It was refurbished but looked brand new. She loved it!

customer_reviews.text: I have odered MOTO x a month a ago and i got the product on time. Mobile and charger is present but missing ear phones. I suggest to go with the amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Absolutely no problem with the product. The product was delivered right on time and have been using it for last 2 months. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vipul

customer_reviews.title: The best phone to have if your budget is low
customer_reviews.text: The best phone to have if your budget is low. A very smart phone for its price. Best design in market. Cool touch. Awesome pic resolution. Best is when the light is less. No other phone has a better camera now. No complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Mango Wireless is ATT Branded
customer_reviews.text: I just received my unit shipped from "Mango Wireless". It is AT&T branded, and appears as if the box has been opened (although the screen cover was still intact and all parts were present, maybe the last purchaser returned it for the same reason). Amazon's return service is great, and they're one day shipping me a replacement. Will update review when I get the new unit. Update: New unit from Cell Surfers has the same issue. Will be ordering the one sold by Amazon for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Goodell

customer_reviews.text: Love this phone its lightening fast when using the internet

customer_reviews.text: Phone was exactly what I wanted, the price was right, the shipping was prompt, I am very pleased with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: It is refurbished.
customer_reviews.text: It's used and is not new. Mine came with a song or two on the corner. Other than that, it works perfectly and I love how fast this phone operates.

customer_reviews.text: Phone has great features. Camera just doesn t match up with iphone. Went back to iphone.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, very rugged and easy to use. The voice recognition features are a plus and makes it stand alone among other Android phones. Solind construction by Mototola.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Contreras

customer_reviews.title: The new one works fine. This is a really nice phone
customer_reviews.text: I received the phone but the microphone did not work. Upon sending it back, a replacement was sent. The new one works fine. This is a really nice phone.
customer_reviews.author: Shekhar Deshpande

customer_reviews.title: excellent phone, everything went very quickly
customer_reviews.text: excellent phone, everything went very quickly, served in Venezuela currently movisrar I use with it is the best phone I've had, I recommend
customer_reviews.author: willian seferen

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent team, provides good performance, the software runs fluid, battery performance is good even with heavy use. The size is very comfortable because it is not overly large.
customer_reviews.author: JAAC

customer_reviews.title: People cannot hear me when I make a call I ...
customer_reviews.text: People cannot hear me when I make a call I live in Brazil and Motorola does not give me warranty. I bough a new product and can't use it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael F.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!! Mic doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered what was supposed to be the "Factory Unlocked" version but I got an AT&T branded phone, which had AT&T apps installed. The box was opened before and sealed again. the sim remover was missing. To my shock I found out that the mic is not working, if I called someone, I could hear them, but they could not hear me. Going to return this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Akhilesh

customer_reviews.title: Motorola Moto X
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone!! Great Price!! Great Features! Camera not so great, but fulfills basic needs. I highly recommend this phone, you get much more than the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin Ponte

customer_reviews.title: It seems like this phone was not new
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy it! It came without the tool for replacing the nano-SIM card and with an old charger. It seems like this phone was not new.
customer_reviews.author: Alves Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade was awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone.. Not quite as good as the second gen but with the lolipop 5.1 upgrade it made some of the features exactly the same
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wood

customer_reviews.title: Smoosh ,I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasure to recommend Moto X. smoosh,clever clean safe Energy saving Its my first time to buy SmartPhone from Amazon US. An interesting experience
customer_reviews.author: Wang Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, upgraded to android 4.4 as soon as I started to using it. The system feels smooth and the screen is great, despite not being full HD.
customer_reviews.author: alexphi

customer_reviews.title: Received the phone in good conditions as it stated on their site
customer_reviews.text: Received the phone in good conditions as it stated on their site. I have not problems with the phone it has been running great.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great, my first android phone, so loving it. Easy to use good photo quality. Touch screen is good. Loving it.

product_meta.title: Motorola Moto X (XT1058) 16GB Unlocked GSM 4G LTE Android Phone w/ 10MP Camera - White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteMotorola Moto X - 16GB, Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - White
feature_bullets: Processor Speed: 1.7 GHz OS: Android 4.2 (Jelly Bean)

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20 and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.
